Testing

Date: 2016-11-22 12:24:17 -0500

Litweaver was a library of original young adult literature developed for schools and distributed as EPUB and Mobi/KF8 files. I worked with Litweaver for two years, creating over 100 ebooks for the series, which included short stories, novels, poems, and plays. I also developed a paragraph-numbering system for them. Previously they had been using non-semantic tables, which presented various problems in resizing and accessibility. Due to compensate for e-reading technology, instead of using for a purely CSS3 solution, I included the numbering in the mark-up and used CSS to position the paragraphs appropriately.
